thread.title: Postol floors Matthysse
thread.title_full: Postol floors Matthysse | Sports | Saudi Gazette

author: LOS ANGELES
title: Postol floors Matthysse
text: LOS ANGELES — Viktor Postol floored Lucas Matthysse with a straight right hand in the 10th round to keep his unbeaten record intact and claim the vacant WBC super lightweight title Saturday. The Ukrainian nailed Matthysse with a vicious right hand over a left jab that sent the Argentine to the canvas and ended the fight at the StubHub Center stadium in Los Angeles. Postol bettered his record to 28-0 with 12 knockouts. Matthysse (37-4, 34 KOs) wasn’t able to handle the taller Postol, who had a substantial height and reach advantage but was regarded as the underdog. — AFP
